name: Vumba home from home
description: A tranquil and relaxing retreat in its own right and ideally located for visiting local tourist attractions in the Vumba Mountains. A good spot for walkers and hikers, bird watchers and photographers. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, families and groups.We are a 25 minute drive from Mutare and 35 minutes from the Mozambique border post on a well maintained tar road.The spaceThe house is breezy, open plan and comfortably furnished with a log fire for the cooler winter months. The veranda has fantastic views of Mozambique and the surrounding mountains and is a perfect place to relax and read a book from our selection in the library. The indigenous garden provides plenty of shade from the leafy trees and is a favourite for the abundant bird life. You will have exclusive use of the swimming pool which is ideal for cooling off on a hot summer day with a braai close by. We do provide firewood if you forget your charcoal.Please note the swimming pool is not fenced.Guest accessYou will have full access to the house and all its facilities. Covered parking is also provided close to the house. A house keeper will tidy up in the mornings and a night watchman remains on duty during the night. Laundry facilities are available on request.Other things to noteThere are two marked pathways meandering through the property along the mountain streams which offer a great opportunity to see our resident bushbuck. We also have a small woodworking studio on the property so please feel free to browse around our showroom.

name: Acacia lodge,Lake Kariba
description: Acacia lodge sits along the shores of Lake Kariba full of wildlife and fantastic fishing on your doorstep. It is in a complex with security provided. The house has three bedrooms, two bathrooms and sleeps six . The lodge is self-catering so you will need to bring all your food with you.Amenities include aircon ,fans ,washing machine ,barbeque and back up generator .It is serviced daily and all cooking is done by the chef. There is a splash pool at the lodge for those hot Kariba months.The spaceAcacia Lodge is situated in the heart of a national park and wildilfe is prolific it is not uncommon to see hippo and elephant wondering past the lodge at night.Other resident game in the area include Eland ,Buffalo ,Impala ,Bushbuck ,Waterbuck as well as the occasional lion , leopard and Hyaena to name a few.During the drier times there is an expansive flood plain in front of the lodge which offers fantastic veiws of game grazing and makes for great walks and birdwatching.When the lake is at it fullest the waters will literally be lapping the front lawn.Each room has an AC as well as a fan and there are two fridges , two deep freezes ,oven ,microwave ,washing machine ,gas cooker ,scottle ,barbeque ,nespresso coffee machine with frother , TV with satelite (guests are required to bring their own pvr decoder).There is a splash pool at the front of the lodge aswell as a large communal pool within the complex which also has a gazebo ,toilets and barbeque faciltys.For the fisherman there is a slipway to launch your boat (as well as a tractor run by the complex to assist in launching if need be )and secure harbour just in front of the lodge .Guest accessGuests will have the whole house to themselvesOther things to notePlease note, there is a TV and satellite dish, however guests will need to provide their own DSTV explora decoder. There is a DVD provided please can you bring your own dvd’s.There is a washing machine available but guests must supply their own washing powder.Unfortunetly there isnt wifi in the lodge but there is good phone signal and data usage isnt a problem.There is a nespresso machine and milk frother but pods are not provided. Guests to provide their own. Electricity in Kariba is fairly constant but in the event of a fault there is a back up generator that Freddy will run for you,guests are required to supply diesel in an event of a lengthly powercut.There is also a gas barbeque ,gas cooker and scottle braai for your conveinience. There are solar lights provided in each room incase of a power cut in the middle of the night .It is advised that guests bring their own torch to spot any animals wondering around at night !There is a small shop and fuel station at NAU about 2kms away where you can buy the basics.For a wider variety there is a supermarket at Nyamhunga township or kariba town Fred can give you directions.

name: Cozy Container Cottage in Victoria Falls
region: Victoria Falls, Matabeleland North Province, Zimbabwe
description: Nestled within a secure private property, this charming container house offers a unique blend of comfort and functionality. Its compact design maximizes space efficiently while maintaining a cozy atmosphere. Just a 15-minute stroll from bustling Victoria Falls, residents can easily enjoy local attractions. One of the property’s most delightful features is the frequent visits from majestic animals just over the wall, creating a magical yet comfortable experience in the heart of nature.The spaceNestled on a secure private property, this cozy container cottage offers a peaceful retreat with both privacy and convenience. Set away from the main house, where the host’s family resides, the cottage is close to the main entry gate. While there may be occasional foot traffic, a privacy fence ensures a comfortable, secluded feel for our guests.Inside, you'll find thoughtfully designed spaces that maximize comfort in a small setting. The bedroom features a comfortable double bed, perfect for a restful night's sleep. The living room provides a cozy spot to unwind, complete with a smart TV, air conditioning, and a sofa that doubles as a single bed for added flexibility.The kitchenette is fully equipped with essentials, including a stove, microwave, mini fridge, and all necessary cooking utensils, so you can prepare meals with ease. The compact bathroom offers a shower and toilet, meeting all your basic needs.For a breath of fresh air, enjoy the charming outdoor deck area—a lovely spot to relax and soak in the surroundings.

name: Arlington Estate. Airport road. 2 Beds.Solar.WiFi

name: Zumbane Lodge 2 (Pungwe)
description: Rustic stone walls with modern conveniences in an African setting. Amazing scenic views.The spaceOverlooking a typical rural African landscape and hazy blue mountains, lies a place so calm and so filled with peace. Welcome to Zumbane. The lodge is rustic yet modern. It sleep four people and provides a sense of being in the wild but has your modern conveniences. Our veranda proves to be the perfect place to lose yourself in a book or watch the sun set as you feel the strength of its glow on your cheeks. We have the perfect landscape for hiking, from short walks around the property to climbing the highest mountain in Zimbabwe. Feel free to enjoy a selection of herbal teas from our complimentary tea station.Due to the Covid-19, we have taken extra care to enhance our cleaning routine.We are disinfecting frequently touched surfaces between reservations. This includes outside areas and furniture.Each lodge has a sanitizer station by the main entrance and we encourage guests to sanitize before entering and when going out.Entrance to the lodges is very controlled. Only booked guests and staff are allowed on the 5 Acre property.

name: Charming Cottage Retreat, Juliasdale
description: Escape to our delightful wooden cabin, perfectly nestled among majestic msasa trees and stunning granite outcrops.Step into the sunlounge and soak in the views over the pristine miombo forest, where you can unwind and enjoy a morning coffee while listening to the symphony of nature. The towering granite monoliths of Susurumba guard this tranquil retreat, providing a breathtaking backdrop for your stay.Hiking the trails starts at your front door followed by evenings in front of the fire.

name: Modern Off-Grid Cottage + Stunning View, Vumba
description: Experience majestic, 360-degree Vumba mountain views from a renovated, OFF-GRID modern farmhouse cottage. Located on a specialty coffee farm just 20 min from Mutare, this bright, open-plan cottage truly blurs indoor/outdoor living. Stargaze in the upstairs sleeping loft. Enjoy the famous Vumba mists from a private outdoor shower. Dine or relax on the wraparound veranda with family & friends. Lounge by the pool. Ideal for a quiet, quality getaway or a base to explore the Eastern Highlands.The spaceBefore we start, here are 4 THINGS PEOPLE LOVE about the Ruby-Hornbill Cottage:1 – It’s all about the VIEW. As you can see from the pictures of the listing, whether you’re having sundowners from the wrap-around veranda or watching the famous Vumba mists from the PRIVATE OUTDOOR SHOWER, the Ruby Hornbill Cottage has unparalleled views of the surrounding Vumba Mountains and Mozambican valleys below.2 – The property is FULLY SOLAR POWERED. If power cuts are getting you down, escape to our off-grid haven. We offer a solar geyser for hot water, a gas stove/oven, and solar for all the lights, fridge, and power needs. 3 – Forget about dated DÉCOR. Our cottage has been recently renovated and has a lot of character. Once a working greenhouse, the cottage has been converted into a bright, open-plan space and is tastefully decorated featuring original creations from Zimbabwean artisans. The elevated sleeping loft (with a queen size bed) offers a unique way to take in the sunrise, while you can stargaze from the studio lounge below-- it features an L-shaped sofa that converts into a deluxe queen size bed. The vintage woodburning stove is perfect for cozy winter’s evenings.4 – The COFFEE TERRACES and mature garden that surround the cottage are magical. It’s the perfect excuse to spend time outdoors with family and friends any time of the year. You may even spot a silvery-cheeked hornbill or some of our other resident wildlife. Take advantage of the POOL and gazebo area, relax in the loungers, or have an evening by the firepit/braai. When the wind is right, we highly recommend flying kites on the front lawn. The cottage is equipped with a TV and media library (movies, series, music). We encourage you to "unplug" during your stay, but it may be possible to access internet by phone at certain points in the property. The kitchen is furnished with a fridge/freezer, gas stove/oven, coffee press, and all the essentials required to unleash your culinary creativity. There is one bathroom downstairs with a bath and shower and a separate adjoining outdoor shower.Should you be traveling with children, arrangements can also be made for a baby cot, high chair, toys/books, etc… to make your little ones feel at home. A futon can also sleep 1-2 additional guests. A housekeeper is available to clean the space daily, and the property and parking are secured with a perimeter fence and alarm system.

name: Java House- Modern, MicroCabin
description: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway. Experience majestic, 360-degree Vumba mountain views in this modern micro-cabin.Located on a specialty coffee farm just 20 min from Mutare, this bright, brand-new cabin truly blurs indoor/outdoor living. Stargaze directly from your bed and witness mountain sunrises and sunsets. Dine or relax on the floating deck with family & friends. Lounge by the pool. Ideal for a quiet, quality getaway or a base to explore the Eastern Highlands.

name: Polished Cottage
description: Msasa Cottage is located in a secure, secluded spot on the top of Emerald Hill, ten minutes from the Harare CBD. This quaint private cottage offers guests a home away from home, with a spacious fully fenced private garden, veranda, lounge and fully equipped kitchen. Owners live on property and access to the pool area is available on request. The cottage is equipped with a solar inverter, solar geyser, and backup generator facilities ensuring hot water and electricity during power outages.The spaceBasic cleaning service included. Laundry and private driver services available on request. Bicycle hire available on request. Please note that the double bed can be switched for 2 single beds with 48 hours notice.Guest accessThis private cottage is fully fenced and separate from the main house. The parking area and laundry area are shared. Access to the pool is available on request.

name: Harare North, Shawasha Hills, Gletwyn. WiFi, Solar
region: Harare East, Mashonaland East Province, Zimbabwe
description: Unlimited WiFi, Hybrid Solar system, Solar geyser. This cozy, Tiny one bed apartment is a compact, minimalist retreat with clever space-saving designs, that invite natural light, and a cozy, intimate atmosphere, nestled in a peaceful natural setting. A cosy getaway and recharge haven. It has a fully functioning kitchen with an oven, fridge and microwave.

name: Baobab House, Tranquil Urban Retreat
description: Welcome to our charming urban homestead! While we don't have goats or cows, our property boasts a thriving vegetable garden and delightful chickens that lay fresh, beautiful eggs. We offer self-catering and are happy to provide you with any of our inseason vegetables, fruit, and eggs for you to enjoy. Perfect for guests seeking a peaceful retreat with a touch of farm-to-table charm!The spaceOur light and airy room features a comfy queen bed and a day bed which is a full-size single bed (can be used as a bed or as a couch), a desk, and an ensuite bathroom. Attached to your suite is your own veranda, on which you will find a lovely tea table and chairs facing our beautiful garden. Or you can have your meals on a wooden table and bench in our communal area.To address Zimbabwe's electricity challenges, we've installed a solar system capable of powering most appliances except those with elements like toasters or kettles. Our solar geyser ensures hot water availability, while a backup generator is available for cloudy days when solar energy may be limited.Guests also enjoy complimentary amenities such as free parking and WiFi access. Experience comfort and sustainability in a serene setting during your stay with us.Guest accessYou have access to a lovely garden in which to relax, a large vegetable garden from which you can pick fresh vegetables and occasionally fruit. A large picnic table is available from which you can have your meals. We have free parking within the property which is safe and secure.Other things to noteWe do have a large German Shepard, Elsa and a smaller German Shepard Mix, Savy, and a huge bumbling German Shepard puppy Sophie - they LOVE people and are sometimes a bit too friendly but we will be there to make sure you don't get sniffed and licked to death!! :) We have two cats who range from very friendly to one who will look at you with such disdain you will probably wonder if you have something stuck in your teeth! :) Please be careful when driving into our yard as our pets do think they own the driveway!WI-FI good speed.

name: Springhide - a scenic cottage retreat in Troutbeck
description: Set in 10 hectares of garden overlooking Nyanga Downs & sleeping up to 10 people, Springhide is the ultimate holiday destination.The cottage has 2 'queen' bedrooms (1 en-suite), a double/twin bedroom with extra beds for children, a mezzanine floor sleeping 2-3, a tented room & a cot.Although self-catering, Rusiah & Simon will look after your needs - cooking delicious dinners whilst you relax in a hot bath.Prices start @$80/night for 2 people sharing. Additional guests will be charged.The spaceThe Nyanga area is famous for its power cuts but with a backup generator at Springhide you will be guaranteed not to be left in the dark (bring your own petrol). Whether you want to relax and read a book or set out to explore the Nyanga National Park this cottage is ideally located to let you do either. Close by, you can do pony trekking, golf, tennis and even volleyball. For those with a sweeter tooth you can visit the local dairy to experience beautiful ice cream and milkshakes. You can even do a daytrip to the new Skywalk and zipline on Mtarazi Falls.The famous Nyanga National Park is home to all sorts of animals and its rugged landscape will take your breath away.We do recommend using a 4x4 (4WD) vehicle to access Springhide.Guest accessWhen you book Springhide you book the whole cottage, no rooms are closed off.We provide all bed linen and towels and there is one cot and highchair available for infants.We also provide a gas BBQ (braai) for use by our guests.Pricing starts @$70 but does increase with the number of visitors. Please message us for a tailor made quote.Other things to noteDiscounts available for larger parties - contact me for more information

name: Doehan Sleeper with ensuite bathroom & fine views
description: A neat, smart and affordable private room with own en-suite bathroom on the ground floor of a family house located in Highlands, a peaceful leafy suburb in Harare. The Doehan Sleeper is the perfect place to sleep for people on business trips, tourist visits or even solo date nights. Our guests love the comfortable bed, lovely backyard for sunny day relaxation, and home office or studying possibility courtesy of our power backup and the best wifi in Zimbabwe!The spaceThe house has an electric gate which opens to a neat garden with flowers, and parking space. The Doehan Sleeper is a private room on the ground floor with own entrance. The windows let in a good amount of sunlight and give a lovely view the of the front yard. There is a double bed, free wifi, (hot) water, power backup, lots of storage space and a coffee table with chairs. Guests can enjoy a warm bath in the ensuite bathroom which is fully equipped with a toilet, bath tub (shower head included) and windows. We also provide a kettle and tea :)**Please note** there’s no kitchen/cooking facility in the room, no TV, and there are dogs on the property. Nearby Places: Harare city centre is 6km away. Please scroll down to the neighbourhood section for more!Guest accessGuests have access to the Doehan Sleeper which is one room only not the whole house. However you are welcome to relax in the front yard. Please note we cannot give guests a remote control for the main gate so to enter and exit the premises use of the intercom or a simple text message to the hosts is required. Don’t worry it’s totally okay for guests to come and go as they please, there is no curfew, we are a phone call or text away :)Smoking outside is allowed but not indoors.During your stayDue to the Covid-19 pandemic we limit physical contact with guests, but we’ll be there to welcome you when you arrive! We can keep in touch, answer your questions, respond to requests and so on via Airbnb chat, text/calls/WhatsApp (0772143109), email (doehan.apartments@gmail.com), or FB and IG @ Doehan Apartments, whichever is best for you :)Other things to note⚠️ Temporary noise potential: we have young visitors in the main house adjacent to the Sleeper, it may get noisy so please bear with us during this time.Please note that there are resident dogs who are members of the host family and provide added security to the place. They are not vicious, don’t worry. However, it is important to consider that they tend to be playful, bark at night, and any unattended belongings left by guests will be left to their mercy. So to avoid damage, please do not leave your belongings unattended outside.Feel free to contact the host if you need to make special arrangements. Perhaps you are new to the city and need guidance on how to plan your vacation. Get in touch today, satisfaction guaranteed!PS after your stay with us, kindly leave a review on our Fb page, Doehan Apartments, too!

name: Jacaranda Outside - Folding Bed
description: Our Jacaranda option is our most budget-friendly choice, perfect for travelers who are only staying for a single night, perhaps crossing the border into Mozambique. It's an outdoor space featuring a foldable sofa, comfortably accommodating up to two people. Privacy is provided by some curtains. As it's a communal area during the day, it's best suited for short stays, ideally just for one night.

name: Tranquil Retreat in the hills
description: You won’t want to leave this charming, one-of-a-kind place. The tranquil splendour and breathtaking views are the main attractions at Matopo Ingwe Lodge. The Matopo Hills are a scenic area of granite whalebacks and castle kopjes, combining ancient and recent history with abundant wildlife and scenic views to offer you a relaxing getaway from city life. The hills also hold numerous rock paintings that depict animal and human figures that date back to the Early Stone Age.

name: The Cozy Place
description: Nestled in the serene neighborhood of Windsor Park in Gweru, this Cozy One-Room Airbnb offers a unique blend of comfort and convenience. Ideal for solo travelers, the space is thoughtfully designed to provide a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Its location offers easy access to Gweru’s key attractions, yet ensures a peaceful retreat away from the city’s hustle. Whether you are visiting for business or leisure, this charming space promises a unique and authentic experience in the heart of Zimbabwe.

name: Kayse Juliasdale Off-Grid Cottage
description: Relax and Unwind at This Peaceful Getaway in JuliasdaleThe spaceTake it easy at this peaceful and unique retreat, tucked away in nature’s embrace. The property offers a calm escape with serene walkways, perfect for anyone who loves to stroll and be surrounded by the beauty of the outdoors.Enjoy the tranquility of the JG Dam, accessible to residents, where you can unwind by the water. You may even catch a glimpse of game animals wandering into the village, adding an extra touch of magic to this charming area.This beautiful spot is the ideal place for those looking to relax, unwind, and enjoy some quality time in a tranquil setting. The cottage features two full bedrooms, and the loft is designed to be a fun, cozy space for children, with four single beds—an ideal spot for younger guests to enjoy their own space while still being close to the family.We can’t wait to welcome you to this tranquil hideaway, where nature meets comfort.Guest accessYou will be able to access the 2.5ha of the property.

Set in the popular Millennium Heights development near Groombridge shopping centre, the accommodation comprises a living/dining room, kitchen with appliances, separate shower and bathroom and one spacious double bedroom with bathroom and shower room. Solar back up power, Hot water, guest toilet, private balcony and parking for multiple vehicles. No parties!Guest accessFull access to the property.Other things to noteCleaner available upon request or once a week for stays of 5 nights+.

It’s back to basics no electricity, no water bush toilet . 3 kms from Harare- Bindura road . It’s 2 kms from Mazowe dam . Road access is horrible dirt road used by scotch carts .

name: Cedar Peak Cottage Nyanga
description: Fully equipped off the grid (no Zesa but great solar) stone cottage located in a private game reserve overlooking the Nyanga National Park and views for 30 km towards Mt Nyangani. Solar lights, Gas Fridges & Generator so bring petrol. Set among dwarf Msasa trees and the indigenous Cedar trees. Relax in the quite and fresh mountain air and enjoy walks, climbing granite domes and red wine in front of the fireplace. 20 km from the Nat. Park and 35km to Mtarazi. Caretaker and Maid - Cook on site.The spaceFacilities include:Braai and outside benches and tableSolar lights and backup generator (bring fuel) . Plug points for chargers.FireplaceFully equipped kitchen and utensilsFreezer, stove and small bar fridge - gas powered Outside wood stove and wood donkey geyserPrepaid Wifi RouterLovely garden and surroundsThe best views of Mt NyanganiBRING THE FOLLOWING WITH YOU- Toilet Paper and personal toiletries (soap)- 5 Lt Petrol per night for the generator plus 200 ml of 2 Stroke oil- Dish washing liquid- Pack of candles- TorchGuest accessNumerous walking paths on common areas. name: The Cottage@Dodger Gray (CDG)
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, cosy and stylish 2 bedroom ensuite cottage in the heart of Athelone, Gweru. Conveniently located just off the Harare highway, close to food courts and just 5 minutes drive to the city centre. The modern furnishings create a cosy living space for your comfort and convenience. Both bedrooms are fitted with large windows and aluminium sliding doors giving guests a view of the garden second to none. Perfect for watching the sunset or just watching the rain.

name: Hippo Cottage
description: This 2 bedroomed lodge is located right on the shores of Lake Kariba. Magnificent sunsets and amazing bird life, hippos and fish eagles. This lodge consists of a loft with a small deck overlooking the magnificent lake. The double bedroom ensuite sleeps 2 people. A beautiful Private patio for 4 people. Perfect for 2 adults and 2 children. Fishing and sunset cruises extra charge.Hippo lodge is a fully catered lodge , prices on request.The spaceBinga is a rural town on the on the south west of Lake Kariba. Hipo Lodge is nestled right on the banks of the lake in amongst the beautiful wild trees. Amazing sunsets.Guest accessPrivate fishing jetty, evening sunset cruises, braai facilities, splash pool, boma and pool deck. Beautiful garden.Other things to noteHot Springs and one of the largest croc farms to visit and of course the little town of Binga.

name: 5 mins from RG Mugabe Airport
description: A neat and simple room within a big house with a shared full bathroom. Make yourself at home at this conveniently located property only 5mins away from RG Mugabe International Airport. Whether you are using this as a transit point between flights or have an early morning flight or late night arrival, it’ll make your journey just a little less stressful. Also sufficient for a long stay if required with access to the rest of the house including a kitchen, dining room, TV lounge & vast garden.

Security, 24 hour monitoring sytem with alarm and response. Shopping mall 3km away, walkable distance to local University. Free parking and wifi. N.B THIS ROOM DOES NOT HAVE A KITCHEN.The spacePlease note that this room does not come with a kitchen.

name: Humphrey Self-Catering Cottages, Nyanga, Zimbabwe
description: The 6 standalone chalets with a combined 25bedrooms self-catering gives you the best gateway Nyanga National Park in Zimbabwe's Eastern Highlands. Spacious stone sculpted houses features divine views, balconies (on some chalets) which offer plenty of photo opportunities and 6 very functional kitchens. Perfect for large family holidays, college and corporate get togethers, school and church retreats. It is kids friendly, with a common pool. Ideal for both short and long stays.The spaceHumphrey Self-catering Cottages |6 separate self contained chalets| 25 bedrooms| 35 beds| 60 people sharing| swimming pool| gas stoves. Situated in Derry of Liverpool Residential Estate on Staffin Road, Juliasdale, Nyanga, the cottages boast of 6 stand alone chalets: 1. Two thatched separate buildings (Humphrey Cottages, sleeps a cpmbined 22) with 8 Bedrooms: 7 Bathrooms and toilets: Verandah entertainment area, double sided fireplace, 2 private balcony for the consumate sundowner, 1 large balcony that serves as both an entertainment area and a viewing deck to enjoy the vast undulating mountains of the Eastern Highlands and the magical Nyangani Mountain, the highest peak in the country; architectural masonry walls, modern kitchen. 2. Wadiwa Cottage - executive 5 all-ensuite bedrooms with 3 king beds and 2 queen beds sleeps 10. light drenched large lounge, unique kitchen.3. Nomaswazi Cottages: consits of two separate units - 4 bedrooms and 3 bedroomed sides each with a separate kitchen and lounge. 4. Dencia Cottage: 5 bedroom all ensuite - 12 sleeper with a vast lounge.The cottages are situated in the uniquely picturesque miombo forests and granite mountains of Juliasdale, these stone cottages, with their beautiful views, will convert every stranger into a friend as you stay overnight. Containing all the trimmings of success - these resplendent homes truly encapsulates the very essence of excellence and captures the soul of Nyanga. They are masterfully designed with special emphasis on light, space and spectacular views that echoes the spirit of uncompromising quality and the ultimate lifestyle as well as a unique architectural marvel. Cognisant of the chilly eastern highlands weather, the stone masonry and thatch are warm in winter and cool in summer. Lavish and generous open-plan receptions spill out to expansive natural forest with hiking trails. Boasting a grand entrance, high double volume living space, large window scapes and a custom designed kitchen with high end appliances to sooth the desires of the discerning self-caterer.
